WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of the webhook response.

ORG_NAME.description: The name of the organziation to run for.

TRAVIS_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for TravisCi. See 'Configure TravisCI Access Token' in the readme for details.

TRAVIS_URL.description: Default is TravisCI Pro API endpoint. Set this to 'https://api.travis-ci.org' for non-Pro accounts.
